oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
First military review
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Exterior view of four men standing at attention with a large building and other people in the background
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Awards; Medals; Military decorations; Military uniforms; Soldiers
Hyde, Radford D.; Kent, Jr., Charles A.; Miller, Lewellyn; Nichols, Kenneth D., 1907-
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: PRO 747-9; 3-11-1945; First Military Review; L to R, Col. Kenneth D. Nichols, District Engineer, presenting awards to Lt. Radford D. Hyde (Bronze Star), Charles A. Kent accepting a posthumous Air Medal and three Oak Leaf Clusters for his son Lt. Charles A. Kent, Jr., and Lewellyn Miller (Purple Heart).
